name: Techlie
description:
Techlie is a first-person shooter action game that progresses part by part, where you fight in another dimension as the scientist named "Aziz".

Story:

Seeing that the dimension to which the Aziz teleported is being attacked by creatures of that dimension, he tries to find a working teleporter and return to his own dimension. In this journey; events such as breaking time and space, horrible experiments will happen.
